display_name: [Heroic Story Born from a Bluff] Hercule

kit.leader_skill: "Earth-Protecting Heroes" or "Saviors" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Hercule's Rage
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK; Raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; A medium chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Cowardly Hero
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) "Earth-Protecting Heroes" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up; For every attack received or evaded: (Forever) DEF 20% up (up to 100%); When there is another "Earth-Protecting Heroes" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Chance of evading enemy's attack 40% up; After receiving an attack: Chance of evading enemy's attack 30% up

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 40% up
